Lyrics:
1 ContributorPrisoner LyricsVerse 1:
I’m getting held down
No matter where I go
It seems like Time stands still
All around me
So many chances
But I can’t take them all
This is the sad life
Behind these walls

Every
Spark of
Hope
Erased
Before it’s
Born

Chorus:
I am trapped by myself
And my reflection says
That I can’t escape
I’m a prisoner
Want to break
These chains
And all these scars will remain
Wanna fight
Again
I’m a prisoner
You might also likeVerse 2:
I keep asking myself
Everyday Everyday
Why do I struggle
Give me a reason
To turn away from the grey
Cause I’m a prisoner
